title.rendered: Some internal diseases and drug use

content.rendered:
Some internal diseases; Thyroid gland diseases or medications used for these diseases, , rheumatic diseases, hormones used, slimming pills, adrenal gland diseases, insulin resistance, diabetes, birth control pills, and sometimes the discontinuation of these control pills are other causes of hair loss. If a sudden hair loss has started, the last three months of surgery, febrile diseases, drug toxicities, blood loss, severe trauma may be among the reasons to consider.

We are providing you with a professional approach to your hair problems that you face while overcoming these troublesome processes with our expert team.

As long as breatⓗtec™quality and ONNA HAIR expertise are with you, you have nothing to worry about. Just call and make an appointment.
